stories.fantasy_headline: Wacky Wonders at the Grand Exhibition of Magical Wares!
stories.fantasy_story: The annual Grand Exhibition of Magical Wares always unveils exciting new enchantments. But this year, many peculiar artifacts left onlookers puzzled. From super-thin magical mirrors to scrolls that fold thrice, the artisans presented truly baffling creations.

stories.original_headline: Logitech caused its mice to freak out by not renewing a certificate

stories.fantasy_headline: Clan Logite's Scrying Orbs Act Up, Arcane Glyphs Missing!
stories.fantasy_story: Users of the Royal Scrying Network reported strange behavior from their Clan Logite scrying orbs and enchanted familiars. It seems the Clan's arcane glyph, necessary for their magical tools to function, was not renewed. Thankfully, Clan Logite has now released a new script to restore order.
